stories.original_headline: A breakthrough that turns exhaust CO2 into useful materials
stories.original_summary: Scientists have created a device that captures carbon dioxide and transforms it into a useful chemical in a single step. The new electrode works with realistic exhaust gases rather than requiring purified CO2. It converts the captured gas into formic acid, which is used in energy and manufacturing.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Forge Artifact to Transform Sooty Fumes!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a wondrous new artifact! This device can capture dark, sooty fumes from hearths and forges, transforming them into a potent elixir in one swift magical step. This valuable concoction can now power workshops and aid in the crafting of many useful goods.

stories.fantasy_headline: Shadow-Stars May Unlock Ancient Sky's Greatest Secrets!
stories.fantasy_story: Through the Grand Observatory's Crystal Orb, Stargazers have seen strange celestial anomalies in the ancient skies. Sky behemoths and abyssal rifts appear too vast for their age, puzzling even the wisest mages. A new theory suggests hidden shadow-stars, fueled by ethereal energy, might explain these cosmic mysteries.

stories.original_summary: The US is now leading a global surge in new gas power plants being built in large part to satisfy growing energy demand for data centers. stories.fantasy_headline: Demand for Arcane Scrolls Fuels Fire-Gem Boom!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Kingdom of Westaria, and realms far beyond, see a great rise in the need for power to fuel their vast repositories of arcane scrolls. To meet this growing demand, more and more dragonfire furnaces are being built. This has led to an age of abundant fire-gems, used to power these wondrous magical archives.

stories.original_headline: Apple just had a record-breaking iPhone quarter
stories.original_summary: Apple says the iPhone had its "best-ever" quarter, with revenue hitting more than $85.3 billion over the past few months. stories.fantasy_headline: Golden Apple Clan Sees Record Sales of Scrying Mirrors!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Golden Apple Clan has enjoyed its finest season of trade ever, reporting unprecedented prosperity! Their popular enchanted scrying mirrors have brought in a hoard of over eighty-five billion gold coins. Overall, the clan's treasure coffers grew by sixteen percent, a truly remarkable feat.
